CHAT.comment: mom laughs.
mom gasps a few times and laughs.
computer box makes noise, and child looks at mom and laughs.
mom and child take hands away from computer box.
mom and child wave hands in front of computer box and it makes noise.
mom waves her hand in front of computer box and gasps.
child stands up and goes to walk away.
mom gasps and child returns to computer box.
child waves her hand over computer box and it lights up, so mom gasps.
mom and child wave hands over both sensors and computer box lights up and makes noise.
child continues to wave her hand after mom stops and mom laughs.
mom points to a certain light on computer box.
mom points to bars and child counts.
child holds up four fingers.
child makes high pitched noise.
child points to fish tank.
child starts hitting the computer box like a drum.
mom laughs.
child pushes mom's hand off computer box so she can play with it.
child tries to pick computer box up.
mom is referring to top sensor, which both mom and child touch.
child lays back and makes snoring noises.
child makes a high pitched noise.
child touches computer box and then quickly pulls her hand away.
INV covers up computer box
INV enters room with Robodog
INV laughs.
INV leaves.
child gets on the floor to play with robodog.
child pushes button and robodog puts his head down.
child talks to robodog.
robodog walks into child's leg.
child talks to robodog.
mom laughs and child talks to robodog.
mom picks robodog up and it starts to move around.
child laughs.
mom picks robodog up to look at him.
child stands up and talks to robodog.
child talks to robodog.
child talks to robodog.
mom and child laugh.
child talks to robodog.
child presses button on top of robodog and it stops moving.
child talks to robodog.
mom gasps and then mom and child laugh.
mom talks to robodog as it starts to move again.
mom picks up robodog to get a closer look.
mom laughs and then child laughs.
robodog stops moving for a second and mom and child laugh.
mom pushes robodog's nose and it moves its head.
child talks to robodog.
child presses button on robodog's back and it moves its head and starts to walk.
mom and child laugh as robodog starts walking towards child.
INV takes robodog from room
mom gasps and mom and child look towards the door.
Thought door creak was a different animal.
INV brings degu into room
INV leaves and mom and child go over to table.
someone says something unintelligible here but unclear if it's INV or MOT
child talks to degu.
child laughs.
child talks to degu and waves at it.
mom holds her finger over cage and degu sniffs it.
child holds her finger over cage and degu sniffs it, child laughs.
degu scratches itself with its leg.
mom and child talk to degu.
child talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
degu sniffs child's finger and mom laughs.
mom talks to degu.
degu stands up to sniff and mom and child laugh.
mom and child laugh again.
child talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child laugh.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child laugh as degu sniffs child's hand.
mom talks to degu.
child laughs as degu touches her hand.
child laughs.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child laugh.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child laugh as degu sniffs child's hand.
INV takes degu from room.
INV brings meerkat into room.
INV leaves.
mom and child simultaneously sing a song from The Lion King.
child does the hula and mom laughs.
mom and child laugh.
child gets up and dances and sings.
child laughs.
child bounces meerkat on table.
mom has meerkat crawl on all fours.
child bounces meerkat on table.
child throws meerkat up in the air and mom and child laughs.
child throws the meerkat in the air a few times and laughs.
child points to computer box.
mom talks for meerkat.
mom makes kissing noise and has meerkat kiss child and child laughs.
mom and child laugh.
mom tries to get meerkat to kiss child but she moves away.
mom and child laugh.
mom throws meerkat at child's head and mom and child laugh.
child makes unintelligible noise and throws meerkat to mom.
child laughs.
mom throws meerkat like a football to child who catches it and laughs.
mom and child throw meerkat around for a bit.
child laughs.
child laughs as mom misses meerkat and it falls behind her.
mom dances meerkat on table and then throws it suddenly.
child gets scared but then laughs.
child throws meerkat straight up and it hits the ceiling.
mom puts meerkat in front of mirror.
child moves chair back to table.
mom touches child's belly with meerkat and makes a noise.
mom does the same thing on child's neck and child laughs.
INV takes meerkat from room
INV rolls toy car into room
INV leaves.
child opens hood of car.
child sends car across room.
mom and child roll car back and forth.
car flips over.
mom laughs as child pushes car backwards.
mom and child laugh.
mom imitates driving.
child laughs.
mom holds hood of car open.
mom points to lights on top of car.
mom points to lights in front of car.
mom points to other lights in front of car.
mom points to rear of car.
mom points to lights on back of car.
child laughs.
child points to passenger seat of car.
mom makes unintelligible noise and drives car up child's arm.
child sends car towards mom.
mom tilts front of car up.
child tilts front of car all the way up and mom laughs.
car falls over backwards.
child points to something on top car.
child thinks for a minute and then shakes her head no after mom shakes her head no.
child just stares at mom.
INV takes car from room
child looks at fish tank.
child runs over to fish tank to pull off cover.
INV laughs and then leaves.
child points to far corner of tank.
mom brings a chair over to sit in front of tank.
child starts counting starfish's arms.
child gets up and moves to other side of cage.
mom looks underneath the tank.
child moves to other side of tank.
mom lightly touches child's hair on her head.
mom blows lightly on child's arm
child points to something in cage.
mom points to far side of tank.
child goes to other side of cage.
child looks behind tank.
mom looks behind tank.
child starts to go to other side of cage but then sits in her chair.
INV covers up fish tank
